answers.answer: My DS needs his Xopenex inhaler occasionally.  He has been on albuterol inhalers in the past also.  Yes, his bg will elevate after a couple of doses of inhaler.  I don't recall 1 time of 2 puffs getting his numbers that high, but we do see elevated bg sometimes when he needs his inhaler.  Since it's hit or miss for us, we just do more corrections when needed rather than change his standard pump doses.

question: Can a proventil inhaler make your glucose go up into the 500's from 2 puffs?
title: diabetes and albuteral inhaler
